rows.label: qev092205_MSG0001
rows.name:
No matter what weird problem you bring to Hope,
she's always sympathetic and full of good advice.
I worry that I make a habit of relying on her...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092205_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'd hate to be a burden on her. As a fellow BLADE,
I need to be pulling my own weight.[ST:wait ]
